testcase.name: Get valid response when getting all policies for account
testcase.system-out: Given I have a valid account................................................passed When I GET the policies.....................................................passed Then I receive a response that contains the expected list of policies.......passed

testcase.name: Get invalid response when getting all policies for account
testcase.system-out: Given I have an invalid account.............................................passed When I GET the policies.....................................................passed Then I receive a response with an error message.............................passed

testcase.name: Get valid response when getting a single policy from an account
testcase.system-out: Given I have a valid account................................................passed When I GET a valid policy...................................................passed Then I receive a response that contains the expected policy.................passed

testcase.name: Get invalid response when getting a single policy for an account
testcase.system-out: Given I have an invalid account.............................................passed When I GET a valid policy...................................................passed Then I receive a response with an error message.............................passed

testcase.name: Get valid response when creating a policy for an account
testcase.system-out: Given I have a valid account................................................passed When I POST a policy........................................................passed Then I receive a response that contains a uuid for the created policy.......passed

testcase.name: Get invalid response when creating a policy for an account

testcase.name: Get valid response when updating a policy for an account
testcase.system-out: Given I have an valid account...............................................passed When I PUT a valid policy...................................................passed Then I receive a response that does not contain an error message............passed

testcase.name: Get invalid response when updating a policy for an account

testcase.name: Get valid response when updating a policy for an account

testcase.name: Get valid response when deleting a policy for an account
testcase.system-out: Given I have an valid account...............................................passed When I DELETE a valid policy................................................passed Then I receive a response that does not contain an error message............passed

testcase.name: Get invalid response when deleting a policy for an account

testcase.name: Get valid response when deleting a policy for an account
